# makeSharedTexture(handle:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a texture that references a shared texture.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeSharedTexture(handle sharedHandle: MTLSharedTextureHandle) -> (any MTLTexture)?
```

## Parameters

- **sharedHandle**: An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSharedTextureHandle] instance, typically from another process using the same GPU device.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture] instance if the method completed successfully; otherwise `nil`.

## Discussion

Call this method from the same [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance that created the shared texture instance.



## Creating textures

- **makeTexture(descriptor:)**: Creates a new texture instance.
- **makeTexture(descriptor:iosurface:plane:)**: Creates a texture instance that uses I/O surface to store its underlying data.
- **makeSharedTexture(descriptor:)**: Creates a texture that you can share across process boundaries.
- **minimumLinearTextureAlignment(for:)**: Returns the minimum alignment the GPU device requires to create a linear texture from a buffer.
- **minimumTextureBufferAlignment(for:)**: Returns the minimum alignment the GPU device requires to create a texture buffer from a buffer.
